name: Evil?Twin Easy Game
text:
You can Tribute 1 "Kisikil" or "Lilla" monster, then activate 1 of these effects.
? Target 1 "Kisikil" or "Lilla" monster you control; it gains ATK equal to the Tributed monster's original ATK, until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field).
? When a card or effect is activated that would destroy a card(s) on the field: Negate that effect.
You can only use this effect of "Evil?Twin Easy Game" once per turn.
